title: An Heir for the Billionaire
description: Katrina has been waiting for her Prince Charming...Katrina Alexander's bland life has her wondering if she'll ever find the true love she's spent her life hoping for. With no current prospects, and a boring job, she's just about given up. However, bumping into her high school sweetheart at her ten year high school reunion has her wondering if maybe she'd met him long ago.He's faced with his mortality and in a race against time...Damon's a self-made billionaire, but aside from his massive fortune has little else to show for the years that have gone by. Without love or a family, he's feeling empty. Seeing Katrina brings up old feelings from the past, and suddenly he can see his future more clearly. Racing against the clock, can he convince Katrina to give him the one thing he desperately needs - an heir?
author: Terry Towers
